list.name: Changes
list.comment:
fix: Improve encryption handling and consistency across services
- Add error handling in the `decrypt_data` function of `encryption.py` - Use UTF-8 encoding consistently in `encryption.py` - Standardize the Fernet key usage via configuration in `config.py` - Apply encryption to `category_service.py` and `sign_upload.py` - Update unit tests to verify encryption and decryption functionality

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions
component.custom-start-script: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

option.name: myCustomStartScript
option.value: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Python tests.Python tests in test_RFID_checkin.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_category_service.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_checkin.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_encryption.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_sign_update.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_sign_upload.py.executor": "Run", "Python.RFID_checkin.executor": "Run", "Python.checkin.executor": "Run", "Python.sign_upload.executor": "Run", "Python.test.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "ml.llm.LLMConfigurable", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
feat: initialize project with check-in API and error handling
- Initialized Flask project structure with basic configuration (app, config, routes). - Added check-in API with POST request support. - Implemented error handling for client, server, and database errors with custom error codes. - Set up MongoDB connection using PyMongo. - Added unit tests with enhanced feedback for diagnostics.

feat: implement category and user query logic with tests
- Added logic to query subcategories and users based on parent_id. - Return 404 when no subcategories or users are found. - Added unit tests for querying subcategories, users, and empty categories.

feat: implement encryption and decryption with test
- Added encrypt_data and decrypt_data functions using Fernet cipher in `encryption.py` - Implemented unit tests to verify encryption and decryption - Added test case to handle invalid encrypted data and raise appropriate exception

feat: add signature upload API and corresponding tests
- Implemented `upload_signature` function in `sign_upload.py` to handle signature uploads and mark users as signed in. - Added unit tests to verify that signatures are successfully uploaded and users' signed-in status is updated.

fix: Convert user identifier from _id to user_id in category service
- Updated user retrieval logic to return user_id instead of _id in API response - Adjusted related test cases to reflect this change

fix: Improve encryption handling and consistency across services
- Add error handling in the `decrypt_data` function of `encryption.py` - Use UTF-8 encoding consistently in `encryption.py` - Standardize the Fernet key usage via configuration in `config.py` - Apply encryption to `category_service.py` and `sign_upload.py` - Update unit tests to verify encryption and decryption functionality

feat: initialize project with check-in API and error handling
- Initialized Flask project structure with basic configuration (app, config, routes). - Added check-in API with POST request support. - Implemented error handling for client, server, and database errors with custom error codes. - Set up MongoDB connection using PyMongo. - Added unit tests with enhanced feedback for diagnostics.

feat: implement category and user query logic with tests
- Added logic to query subcategories and users based on parent_id. - Return 404 when no subcategories or users are found. - Added unit tests for querying subcategories, users, and empty categories.

- Updated user retrieval logic to return user_id instead of _id in API response - Adjusted related test cases to reflect this change

fix: Improve encryption handling and consistency across services
- Add error handling in the `decrypt_data` function of `encryption.py` - Use UTF-8 encoding consistently in `encryption.py` - Standardize the Fernet key usage via configuration in `config.py` - Apply encryption to `category_service.py` and `sign_upload.py` - Update unit tests to verify encryption and decryption functionality

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
fix: Improve encryption handling and consistency across services
